definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue

sentences.english: Objective To study clinical presentations and complications of prolapse of gastric mucosa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃黏膜脱垂症的临床表现及其并发症。

sentences.english: It has thin lamina propria and no glands.
Hysteroscopic operation is the best choice in treating submucous myoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论治疗子宫黏膜下肌瘤，宫腔镜手术是最佳选择。

sentences.english: Then the labeled bladder cancer cells were implanted into the nude mice bladder by intravesical instillation.
sentences.chinese: 采用经尿道膀胱灌注法使肿瘤细胞种植于膀胱黏膜。

sentences.english: Tan-yellow plaques are seen in the lower esophagus, along with mucosal hyperemia.
sentences.chinese: 食管下段可见黄褐色的斑块，同时黏膜充血。

sentences.english: I still suffer from catarrh and sinus problems.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然患有黏膜炎和鼻窦炎。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the regulatory effects of bombesin on the activities of disaccharidase in the intestinal mucosal cells in neonatal rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨铃蟾肽对新生兔小肠黏膜双糖酶活性的影响。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish a murine model of radiation-induced oral mucositis.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立放射性口腔黏膜炎动物模型。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a new treatment to repair perforation of nasal septum with free mucosa of nasal bottom.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究应用游离鼻底黏膜修补鼻中隔穿孔的效果。

sentences.english: After the culture in vivo for 4 weeks, the cell-seeded scaffolds looked like tissues.
sentences.chinese: 犬腹腔内培养4周后，可形成食管黏膜样组织。

sentences.english: Clinically, it is characterized by severe mucosal erosions and various cutaneous lesions.
sentences.chinese: 临床表现为严重的黏膜糜烂和多形性皮肤损害。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the preparing technique of melatonin starch microspheres for intranasal administration.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究褪黑激素鼻黏膜给药淀粉微球的制备工艺。

sentences.english: Mucosal biopsy by gastroscopy showed low differentiated adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 胃镜下胃黏膜活检示低分化腺癌。

sentences.english: The boundary between tunica adventitia which is serosa and submucosa is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 外膜为浆膜，与黏膜下层分界不明显。

sentences.english: An inner mucous membrane has cilia (see cilium) that project inward to trap particles.
sentences.chinese: 内层的黏膜有纤毛，向内突出以挡住微粒。

sentences.english: Adopt delamination anastomosis for mucosa layer and muscle layer in esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 食管胃采取黏膜层和浆肌层分层吻合。
